trans-unit.source: Provides design-time visual support for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 디자인 타임 시각적 지원을 제공 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"> </xref> 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The WebZoneDesigner class is the abstract base class for both <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner>, which all the other zone designers inherit from.
trans-unit.target: WebZoneDesigner 클래스는 모두에 대 한 추상 기본 클래스 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner>, 다른 모든 영역 디자이너에서 상속 된.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner>

trans-unit.source: By inheriting directly from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> instead of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>, it allows implementations of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method that do not automatically clear the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection, thus enabling the designer to render exceptions from child controls.
trans-unit.target: 직접 상속 하 여 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>대신 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>를 구현할 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>자동으로 취소 하지 않는 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>컬렉션, 예외에서 자식 컨트롤을 렌더링 하는 디자이너를 활성화 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Like other designers in this namespace, WebZoneDesigner overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property to always return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이 네임 스페이스의 다른 디자이너와 마찬가지로 WebZoneDesigner 재정의 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>속성을 항상 반환 `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the designer bound to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된에 바인딩되는 디자이너의 인스턴스를 만들고 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"></xref> control associated with the designer.
Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너에서 디자이너와 연결 된 실제 컨트롤이 아닌 임시 복사본을 디자인 타임 태그를 생성을 사용 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.
